title: Client crashes during champion select=dodge penalty
body: Despite the client saying an error has occured...cause why not

replies.body: When you enter champion select, everyone is grouped together into the same server and requires a constant connection to communicate your picks and bans.  It sounds like your network might have lost connection during champion select, and left you behind.  If you're still experiencing this, I recommend going over the steps in the[ troubleshooting connection issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to help fix this up.  I also suggest doing any testing in custom games to prevent queue dodge penalties.  Let me know if you have any issues afterwards!

Likely due to an unstable connection with the servers. [Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
